elements.label: The Good, the Bad, the Ugly
elements.desc: The Librarian has left the world behind. This has its advantages, but also its price.

elements.label: Navigating the House
elements.desc: Left-click to interact with objects and rooms; right-click or use cursor keys to move your view around (you can change keys in Settings).

elements.label: What is Most Fitting?
elements.desc: Click a slot to highlight everything that can go over it; mouse over an Aspect to highlight everything with that Aspect.

elements.label: Up Close
elements.desc: If you're new to BOOK OF HOURS... you might not realise just how far you can zoom in with the scroll wheel.

elements.label: Time Enough
elements.desc: The seasons will pass; don't worry. There's no need to hurry... except in Numa.

elements.label: The Tree of Wisdoms
elements.desc: Commit Skills to the Tree to get more Soul cards... and also to develop your understanding of the world and the Histories.

elements.label: Ink
elements.desc: If you used up your starting ink, don't worry. There are lots of inkpots in the House, and you can learn to brew your own ink.

elements.label: READ EVERYTHING
elements.desc: Everything. Read everything.

elements.label: Save your game if you're worried about what might happen next
elements.desc: BOOK OF HOURS is a gentler game than Cultist Simulator - you can save and load at will.

elements.label: Much is taken, much abides
elements.desc: House furnishings are sometimes unique. Resources are not. If you destroy a resource, you can always get a replacement eventually.

elements.label: DON'T PANIC
elements.desc: If you think you've hit a dead end, try something else. There's always a way forward, although it may take you in a different direction than you had planned...

elements.label: Workstation Hints
elements.desc: The icons at the top of the Workstation window suggest relevant Powers to use in recipes at that workstation.

elements.label: Black Dove, White Crow
elements.desc: Before the Curia, before the Dewulfs, before the Church of the Unconquered Sun, the sisters of the Knot kept their secrets in the caves of the Isle.

elements.label: Speed Controls
elements.desc: Space pauses; numpad + and - change speed up and down; you can change these keyboard shortcuts in Settings.

elements.label: The Watchman's Tree
elements.desc: Hush House is one of the nine great libraries of the Watchman's Tree - the select few places where the Hours sanction the preservation of forbidden knowledge.

elements.label: Send to Slot
elements.desc: Weary wrist? Shift-click sends to the nearest workstation; ctrl-click to the nearest verb; you can change these keyboard shortcuts in Settings.

elements.label: Put Your Journal Somewhere Safe
elements.desc: You can't destroy it by accident, but if you put it on the wrong shelf, you might be vexed. This is an accurate simulation.

elements.label: Go to Completed Workstation
elements.desc: Hit BACKSPACE to cycle between workstations with finished recipes.

elements.label: The Curia's End
elements.desc: Thirza Blake, Seventh Librarian, spent all the House's money on her projects before her disappearance... and that's when Nocturnal Branch stepped in.

elements.label: Memories and Lessons
elements.desc: When upgrading a Skill, you can use a Lesson from any skill if it matches at least one Aspect... and you only need one Lesson. The rest can be any matching Memory.
